name: node-red-contrib-selenium-wd2
description: Selenium-webdriver nodes for Node-RED based on node-red-contrib-selenium-webdriver

scripts.prepublishOnly: mkdir dist && cp -r src/icons dist/icons && cat src/nodes/*.html > dist/selenium-wd2.html && tsc
scripts.test-wd-full: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' NOCK_OFF=true mocha --retries 2 --grep '^(?!.*Nock Only).*$' --timeout 30000 -r ts-node/register 'test/unit/**/*.ts'
scripts.test-wd-chrome: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' NOCK_OFF=true mocha --retries 2 --grep '^.*Chrome(?!.*Nock Only).*$' --timeout 30000 -r ts-node/register 'test/unit/**/*.ts'
scripts.test-wd-safari: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' NOCK_OFF=true mocha --retries 2 --grep '^.*Safari(?!.*Nock Only).*$' --timeout 30000 -r ts-node/register 'test/unit/**/*.ts'
scripts.test-wd-edge: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' NOCK_OFF=true mocha --retries 2 --grep '^.*Edge(?!.*Nock Only).*$' --timeout 30000 -r ts-node/register 'test/unit/**/*.ts'
scripts.test-wd-firefox: env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' NOCK_OFF=true mocha --retries 2 --grep '^.*Firefox(?!.*Nock Only).*$' --timeout 30000 -r ts-node/register 'test/unit/**/*.ts'
